resps: Transformed a completely static HTML, CSS, JS, AND REACT single page application into an interactive user interface using animations, transitions, and carousels
Processed API requests with Axios to dynamically represent data from a cloud server alongside pagination, skeleton loading states, and dynamic routing
Used back-end frame works, such as firebase, and developed full stack websites that store user data and payments
Showcased expertise in advanced UI design towards full stack websites
Used my expertise, with my creative skills, to add unique touches to the front-end UI of every website I created
Covered the basics of GIT, HTML, CSS, JS, and the Command Line from July 2022 - December 2022
After basics I moved onto the advanced concepts and frameworks such as React and NodeJs
Put in 30 hours+ a week diving into many different projects combining the trinity of coding languages
Touched base with numerous frameworks and integrated artistic ability towards every project I've built
Gained understanding of GIT commands for installing packages such as 'npx' and 'npm'
Learned how to integrate GIT into my workspace within VScode and use various module bundlers such as webpack
Given a sharper mental toolset with a different way of looking at website problems and how to fix them
I took git deployment to the next level with webpack/Node based projects and learned how to deploy to a secondary branch(gh-pages)
Used Linux within my virtual machine to make my windows system compatible with a unix based coding enviroment
